definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: whispering, defamation, evil report (? as that which glides stealthily)—abs. ´[[ד]] Nu 14:36, Pr 10:18; cstr. [[דִּבַּת]] Je 20:10 + 4 t.; sf. [[דִּבָּֽתְךָ]] Pr 25:10 [[דִּבָּתָם]] Ge 37:2; —
whispering Ps 31:14, Je 20:10 (Hi Hup De Gf VB; yet cf. Che Psalm).

evil report, specif. a (true) report of evil doing Ge 37:2 (P) [[וַיׇּבֵא אֶת־דִּבָּתָם רָעָה]]; cf. also Pr 25:10 & Ez Eze 36:3 [[וַתֵּֽעֲלוּ עַל־שְׂפַת לָשׁוֹן וְדִבַּת־עָָם]], unfavourable report of spies Nu 13:32, Nu 14:36, Nu 14:37 (all P & all c. [[הוֹחִיא]]; adj. [[רעה]] only Nu 14:37).
